evidence.text:
ANI: You two are fucking dead for this. I'm Ivan's fucking wife.
GARNIK: She broke my fucking noce man. You broke my nose you fucking bitch!
ANI: Good. I'm glad I broke your fucking nose.
ANI: You two are fucking dead for this. I'm Ivan's fucking wife!
ANI: Let me the fuck go.

ANI: Untie me now, motherfucker. This is so fucking illegal!
GARNIK: Don't do that!
ANI: You fuck! Untie me now!
